sentence: In trading on Tuesday, real estate shares were relative leaders, up on the day by about 3.9%.
Leading the group were shares of China HGS Real Estate ( HGSH ), up about 72% and shares of China Housing & Land Development ( CHLN ) up about 8.2% on the day.

Also showing relative strength are home furnishings & improvement shares, up on the day by about 2.6% as a group, led by American Woodmark ( AMWD ), trading higher by about 15.9% and Home Depot ( HD ), trading higher by about 5.1% on Tuesday.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
